text: Design should work WITH life flow – seen too many fancy but impractical setups!
Bakery vanished... Now gym where we eat less carbs lol
so long record store... hello silent book cafe 🙄
boteco turned bookshop here... muito louco!
chef life's hectic—still find zen plating food... seeking equilíbrio always
Sempre ouço sobre o "Cabeça de Cuia". Spooky stuff!
Banguela do Flamengo freaks out everyone here... kids avoid it after soccer games lol!
C'mon now... don't need science when you got decades of folks swearing they've seen something spooky. Adds flavor to life here! 🌶️
Haha sure she doesn't take things too? Suppose her stash would make for one epic garage sale huh 😆 – stuff vanishing/reappearing seems just another Tuesday around these parts...
colder temp outside = comfort food on stove inside 😋
Rainy days actually give me an excuse to experiment more in the kitchen - brings out some creative energy!
Life makes you swap dreams sometimes, huh?
airports are hectic yeah, mas those global tastes spark killer recipes at your cozinha 😉🌎🍳
nailed making feijoada for friends on point first try... felt like i'm official chefin', even at home! 🥘👌

Yeah, couldn’t agree more - life’s way too unpredictable for strict deadlines! Seems everyone around here tosses out that old timeline... went down my own road without stress on 'should be' dates 😅👨‍🍳
Spot on! Life’s too rich for strict timelines... Cadê one-size-fits-all?
na maioria das vezes é só sonho mesmo...
Budgets tight...less steak-more beans at home these days ✂️🍖
once had to serve 100 guests but ran outta avocados for guac—ended up blending peas with some spices... nobody noticed! gotta be ninja-quick in those situations 😆👨‍🍳
Tape on countertops? pffft once had to use foil as makeshift pan lid during a busy service...talk about heat retaining hacks! cozinha life's wild sometimes 😂👨‍🍳
every plate served feels like hitting "publish" on your soul

Crazy how some dudes still think women can't handle the heat... Yet there's no shortage of tough as nails 'chefas' slaying daily specials 👩‍🍳 Different story when SHTF during service though – merit wins over muscle every single time!
In any pro kitchen, skills talk loudest.
chef here... never felt boxed by "gender roles" so just followed passion for food – kitchen doesn’t care if you're homem ou mulher; only cares if u can cook 🔥🔪 gotta break taboos one dish at a time!
In cooking too–gender doesn’t dictate skill.
Career's more than stereotypes.
kitchens seem diverse but look closer at who’s head chef vs line cook & tell me we're there yet
Kitchen's still old school here; change feels slow.
Cresci numa metrópole comida é cultura lá... inspira demais!

understand where you're coming from... big cities getting attention definitely changes things up - rents go up, old hangouts can get too touristy... nostalgia for those low-key days hits hard sometimes 😔 but cool seeing your own place appreciated worldwide too right? gotta take good w/ bad i guess
São Paulo was always buzzing... feels no different tbh!
Knew it was gonna get noticed eventually...🧐
